name: Wall-Breaker
description:
Wall Breaker is a short jam game, entry for META GAME JAM.

The Story

Wall Breaker tells a story about a programmer, who accidentally joined a game jam,

and eventually made the game of Wall Breaker.

Wall-Breaking Gameplay

The game  itself is all about wall-breaking. But some time it requires more than brute force to solve a puzzle. 

Controls:  ARROWS keys and SPACE key only.

Notes to players:

The game resolution is very wide, please dont simply maximize the window.
Instead, press 1~4 to choose a preset resolution that fits your screen.

Press 1 = 960*360
Press 2 = 1200*450
Press 3 = 1600*600
Press 4 = 1920*720
